cards.title: My Story
cards.subHeader: Who I am, what I've done
cards.caption: Eric on the left, Mason in the middle, Jessica on the right
cards.content: Hi, I'm Eric. I was born, raised, and educated in the sleepy, brave little state of Vermont. I have experienced life in a small town, lived in the Caribbean, and babysat passenger jets.
cards.hiddenContent: I have seen my baby boy grow, learn, and love. I have watching my wife overcome challenges with a level of grace that I can only hope to achieve. I have done my best to appreciate those moments in life that are quiet and still. Every experience and individual has left a profound mark on my life, I am thankful for each and every one.
